verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
He still working on me
To make me what I ought to be
It took Him just a week to make the moon and stars,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
The sun and the earth and Jupiter and Mars
How loving and precious He must be
He still worling on me.
verse 1

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
There really ought to be
A sign upon my heart
Don't judge him yet

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
There's an unfinished part
But I'll be perpect just according to His plan
Fashioned by the Master's loving hand
verse 2

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines:
In the mirror of His Word
Reflections that I see

verse.name: c1f
verse.lines:
Make me wonder why He never gave up on me
He loves me as I am
and helps when I pray
Remember He's the Potter, I'm the clay
